msbt.message: Oh, it's you! Well, I'm right in the middle of gettin' my things together so I can move on. It's gonna be up to you to rouse rabble on this island after I'm gone, kiddo. Gahaha!

Hey, you wanna give me a hand with packin' and movin'?<10_4 /> Gahaha! I'm just teasin'. Thanks for bein' a stand-up neighbor while I was here, kiddo.Even though I'll be on some other island far away, I'll think of you from time to time. Count on it!
Well, if it ain't ! You know I'm movin' away tomorrow, right? I gotta say, there was never a dull moment with you around. Thanks for that, kiddo.

Oh, ! Say, I know it's kinda sudden, but I'm actually movin' outta here tomorrow. I didn't get the chance to tell you earlier, and now I'm all busy what with packin' up and stuff. SoI guess this is kinda goodbye. It's been real, kiddo.If I could leave you with one piece of advice, it's this: stay hydrated, and keep yer chin up. Gahaha!

Oh, hey there! You're a local, I take it? It's kinda funny that we've never actually met. Specially since I'm gettin' ready to move as we speak.Well, at least we got to say howdy this one time. Keep the place hummin' along, will ya?

Oh, ! I'm glad you're here. Been meanin' to chat with you about somethin'. See, I'm actually movin' off the island. Liketoday. So this'll be our last rap session for a bit. I don't even know where I'm headed yet. Just gonna follow whatever direction the wind's blowin'
Move to my island!
All the best.

Oh, hey, I'm real glad I ran into you, . I, uh, gotta tell you somethin'It's like this—I'm movin' away. Today. So this might just be the last we see of each other, . It's been great knowin' ya, but I'm strikin' out across that big blue sea. New horizons, and all that Take real good care of the gang on this island for me, y'hear?

We haven't met before, have we?<10_4 /> Well, the name's . Good to meetcha, kiddo. Well, this is a bit awkward, actually. See, technically I'm movin' away forever. Uhhtomorrow. So it's hello and goodbye all at once. I guess that's as efficient as it gets. Gahaha!

We haven't met before, have we?<10_4 /> Well, the name's . Good to meetcha, kiddo. Well, this is a bit awkward, actually. See, technically I'm movin' away forever. Uhhtomorrow. And I already know where I'm goin', so it's no use tryin' to talk me outta my plan. I'm stubborn!Take care anyway, . See ya when I see ya.

Hey, thanks! Ain't often I meet someone who can appreciate my ramblin' lifestyle. They say, "When are you gonna grow outta this nonsense? Pick an island and settle down, why don'tcha?" But you get it. Shoot, you're a traveler yourself.Maybe we'll run into each other againon or somewhere else in the wild world.

So, it's been decided. I'm gonna hang my hat on . Nifty name for an island, right? Here's hopin' the folks over there are as cool as you, kiddo.Hey, if the mood strikes, you oughta come and visit me there sometime. You're always welcome.

I think I'm gonna have to actually sit down and do some thinkin' about where I'm headed next. If you run into me again, don't be shy about comin' over and sayin' hello, OK? Take care of yourself, kiddo. See you when I see you. Gahaha!
Bein' in the same neighborhood as you again is gonna be a blast, kiddo!It'll be just like the old days! <10_4 /> Wait, what did we used to do in the old days? Gahaha!
Hey, I'm hopin' to see you runnin' around sometime, y'know. I'm countin' on you to show me how things work over there and introduce me to folks and whatnot.
Hey, have you heard of a place called ? That's where I'm movin'! I got nothin' left to do but sit back and daydream about the future
I think I'll do alright for myself on my new islandas long as I keep an open mind. 'Course, I met you when I was still a closed-minded crank. Gahaha!
Oh man Movin' is so excitin', but packin' is the worst.It doesn't help that I keep findin' old books and crackin' 'em open for a chapter or two.

I might be movin', but no new island is gonna change !I'm gonna walk REAL slow everywhere I go—I don't care if anyone's behind me. And I'm gonna talk REAL loud in the bathroom, sometimes to myself!Yep, I'm gonna be true to myself and find out who my real friends are, if I have any. Gahaha!
So, the thing is, I'm definitely movin'—I just don't know where yet.I don't want too much noise, but I don't wanna go somewhere boring either Hey, if you know of a place, I'm all ears, OK?
How about my island?
Can't help you, sorry.
Wait, you're talkin' about me movin' back to ?Hmm Huh Let's see WellI guess I could do that! See you there, kiddo!Oh, fine. Guess I should talk to your Resident Services or somethin' first. Gahaha!

You serious, kiddo? <10_4 />I mean maybe that IS a good idea!Alright, done deal. I'm there. Pack me up in a crate and ship me off to ! I'm fired up, kiddo! Gonna get your Resident Services on the squawk box so I can give 'em what for!
Ah, no matter! I'm just gonna see where the wind takes me. Maybe I'll do some island hoppin' And if I do find a place as nice as , maybe I'll settle down for a spell.

So here's the lowdown, kiddo I called your Resident Services, askin' if the island can fit me in. Andit can! So, write it down in permanent ink—I'm officially a resident of ! Guess you'll be seein' a whole lot more of me! Gahaha!

So here's the lowdown, kiddo I called your Resident Services to ask if they got room for me there. Andit's a no-go. Sounds like your island is chock-full already. Any more folks and it might just sink! Waitcan islands sink?<10_4 /> Bah! Better not to risk it.

So here's the lowdown, kiddo I called your Resident Services to see if your island had room for me. Andit's a no-go. There's no more space for anyone to build a house!Well, I ain't livin' on no beach again! Been there, done that. Sorry, kiddo.

What's goin' on with your island, kiddo? Resident Services is sayin' they're full up! Just my luck that I get invited to the most popular island around, only to miss out. Thanks for the invite, but I suppose it's just as well. I'd probably drive off half the population. Gahaha!

No space to build any more houses Can you imagine?Must be somethin' real special goin' on over at your island, huh? Shame I can't be a part of it. Thanks for the invite anyway, kiddo. Really perked me up. Gave me somethin' to think about.
Well now, hang on just a minute. Maybe I need to ask again, but with a tad more gumption, .
You might be right!
I'm not so sure.
Hmm Not so sure, huh?Guess I should trust the process instead of tryin' to force the issue, . Thanks for the advice, kiddo.
